data.actual_result: They have a background color that doesn't fit Dark theme at all
data.expected_result: The permission that you can't revoke because "it would remove it from you" should be just grayed out
data.short_description: On Dark theme, channel permissions override that you can't revoke because "it would remove them from you" have a wrong background color
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your theme to Dark - Be in a role with Manage channels but not Administrator - Have an admin set permissions override in a channel so your role has more perms in it - Go to Channel settings > Permissions > Your role
